cyclone.name: NICOLE
cyclone.current_location: about 415 mi ENE of the northwestern Bahamas
cyclone.trajectory: Turning west-southwest on Tuesday, then tracking west toward the northwestern Bahamas and the east-central Florida coast before curving northward up the U.S. East Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: east-central Florida coast (around Volusia/Brevard County area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch along Florida east coast from Hallandale Beach to the Volusia/Brevard County line; Tropical Storm Watch Hallandale Beach to north of Ocean Reef
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning for the northwestern Bahamas; Tropical Storm Warning Hallandale Beach FL to Altamaha Sound GA and Lake Okeechobee; Storm Surge Warning North Palm Beach FL to Altamaha Sound GA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northwestern Bahamas and much of the southeast U.S. Atlantic coast from Florida through Georgia and the Carolinas
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-storm-force winds expected at St. Croix
